attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All of you who have followed the excessive amount of lorries on the A14, and sat sandwiched in between them as they then pull out to overtake another with not enough power to successfully manage this and have to swerve back in again, and having watched them sway over the road then pull into obviously much required service stops please sign below, to demand a lorry only lane be created on this dangerous road.
Every day there is an accident on this road, and today another child has lost his life due to  a collision with a lorry, next time it could be one of your family
